<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://www.cppblog.com/huaxiazhihuo/archive/2017/07/15/215111.html"><span style="font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#2E9CE9;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">回顾</span><span style="color:#2E9CE9;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">C++</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本人对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">的认识，多年下来，经历了以下几个阶段，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">很好很强大，盲目追求运行性能，简直巴普洛夫条件反射，贡献了一大坨垃圾代码；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的面向对象对持很垃圾，什么鬼，代码很容易就耦合，于是迷上对象</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">+</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消息发送的面向对象；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">太复杂了，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">template</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">太抽象，天外飞仙，搞不懂，二进制复用又差。整个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就是垃圾，简直程序设计语言里面的败类，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言多好啊，小巧精致简单清晰；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用其他语言做开发，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">java</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C#</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">F#</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">elisp</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">scheme</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">python</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">haskell</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">javascript</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">php</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">等等一大坨语言，感概每一种语言都比垃圾</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不要好太多，发誓不再用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">写哪怕一行的代码；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">某一天，突然有点理解了这种语言，一切变得清晰了，原来</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">也相当不错，也可以做一些事情，看开之后，感觉开发效率也跟上来了，做同样的事情，用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">实现不会比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C#</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">python</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">等慢。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">相比于其他语言，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的独特优势在于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">预编译期的伪图灵完备，这一点，好多语言还是有的，并且更超级好，比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rust</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">scheme<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编译期间的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是功能完备的解释器，其输出结果是正常运行的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">代码，结合宏，可以制造很多其他语言必须在语法层面上支持的语法糖。这个解释器的奇妙之处在于它运行于编译期，一旦错误的模板代码要进入运行期，就会出现编译错误，而不需要进入运行时的代码，即便天大错误，也都不要紧，而一旦这段代码要进入运行时，那么模板错误就逃不过编译期解释器的法眼。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">生成各种内存布局的便利语法糖和自由的内存操控；不同类型的对象，只要其内存布局一致，通过强制转换，就可按同一类型来处理，这一点作死能力，绝不被有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">gc</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的语言支持。内存的无节操玩弄，结合</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">template</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，分分钟就能仿真出来其他必须语言层面上提供的数据结构，类型安全、运行性能、易用性，一点都不逊色，好比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">string</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，委托，元组，列表，可空类型；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的专有特性，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">raii</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、多继承和全局变量。特别是全局变量，结合它的构造函数特点和类型推导，所能玩出来的丰富新花样，其他语言很难做到。全局变量是连接运行期和编译期的桥梁。如果没有全局变量，本座应该不会再次对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">产生热情。奇怪的是，至今为止，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的基础库都不怎么挖掘全局变量的潜能。当然，对全局变量的使用，肯定是把它当做常量来用，全局变量有唯一的内存地址，就起到原子的作用，但它又可打包了丰富的静态类型信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">以上的独特，造就了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">层出不穷的新意，而卓越的运行性能，只是其微不足道的优点。虽然说，语言不重要，思想才重要，软件架构才重要，但是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所能承载的思想，以及其到达的抽象高度，的确就真的大大降低框架的复杂性，诚然，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的基础库开发要面临无穷无尽的细节纠结，其实，这也反映了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编译器掌控细节的能力，因此，我们又可以让编译器自动完成很多很多细节重复，从而大幅度地减轻代码数量，还无损其运行性能。又由于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">完备强大的静态类型特性，在用动态语言风格的简洁来编写代码的同时，又无损其快速方便地代码重构。笔者的基础库项目，几十次大规模的重构，借助单元测试，保证了重构顺利快速的完成，深感</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在重构上的便利，这些代码，包括不到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">千行却功能完整的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">xml</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">库（还支持对象与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">xml</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">数据的直接互相转换）；不到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">千行却一点都不逊色于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">boost</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">spirit</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">组合子解释器（编译速度却快了很多，语法上简洁很多，更能方便地解释各种语法）；才</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">千多行的异步</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">io</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">框架；输入输出，文件操作，数据库，协程等代码都简洁异常，所有这些代码都支持动态库上的二进制复用，让人很惊诧于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的光怪陆离的强大。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当然，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c++</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">的缺陷也震撼人心，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言特性太过繁杂抽象微妙，比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">template</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、多继承、运算符重载、类型转换、兼容性考虑的很多糟糕语言特性，所以对使用者的节制力要求很高，要求他们时刻清楚自己在干什么，琐碎上的思考太多；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
